emptyState.description: To calculate your FIRE number, we need to know your monthly expenses.

info.title: What is FIRE?
info.description: Financial Independence, Retire Early. The FIRE calculator shows you how much money you need to never work again (4% Rule).

fiNumber.label: Your FI Number
fiNumber.infoNote: About FIRE: Financial Independence means having enough invested assets to cover annual expenses using the 4% safe withdrawal rate. Coast FIRE means your current savings will grow to FI Number by retirement age without additional contributions.

legend.currentPath: Current Path: With ${{monthlySavings}}/month contributions at {{returnRate}}% annual return
legend.coastFire: Coast FIRE: Stop contributing, let current ${{currentSavings}} grow {{achievedText}}

scenarios.title: FI Scenarios
scenarios.subtitle: Compare different retirement lifestyle scenarios
scenarios.infoNote: Tip: Lean FIRE allows you to retire sooner with a minimal lifestyle. Fat FIRE provides more cushion but takes longer to achieve. Choose based on your priorities.

settings.title: FIRE Settings

safeWithdrawal.label: Safe Withdrawal Rate
safeWithdrawal.tooltip: The 4% Rule: Withdraw 4% of portfolio annually to sustain for 30+ years.
